text: @realDonaldTrump THEY ARE NOT COMING BACK. YOU SENDING PEOPLE OUT IN THESE CURRENT CONDITION IS GENOCIDE!!! Stop letting your pride blind you from fact the COVID-19 is still out here killing us.
